text: the focus now is to find the black boxes
this light like all civilian aircraft
carried two of them a flight data
recorder and a cockpit voice recorder
both located at the back of the plane
Indonesian officials believe the plane
wreckage is at the bottom of the Java
Sea which is relatively shallow between
20 to 25 meters deep naval divers
haven't been able to search for it due
to bad weather so Indonesia has deployed
a pinger locator to search for the
planes underwater locator beacon this
should help locate the aircraft and
black box flight recorders if these are
underwater a high-frequency ping is
emitted every second for at least 30
days the flight recorders are protected
by steel casing designed to resist water
pressure and survive major catastrophes
to find out what really happened it is
crucial that the search teams recover
the black boxes
